passwords.expired_link: The link you have provided is expired.  Please click the "Send e-mail" button below to receive a new link
passwords.invalid_link: The link you have provided is invalid.  Please click the "Send e-mail" button below to receive a valid link
passwords.valid: Please enter your new password and click the "Change password" button
passwords.invalid_user: Can't find the specified user.  Please click the "Send e-mail" button below to receive a new link
passwords.password_changed: Password changed, proceed to the Login page to login
passwords.email_sent: A new link has been sent, please check your e-mail and open the new link
passwords.default_password_message: You are currently logged in with the default password.  Change the password to ensure security of your plant data.
passwords.password_rules:
• 6 – 12 characters
  • At least one capital letter
  • At least one number
passwords.forgot_password_message: Click on Submit to get the password for the selected user on below mail address.
